level.heading: Authorization of grants to develop satellite child development home programs.
level.text: The Department is hereby authorized to make grants to private agencies that work with child development homes and to licensed child development centers for the purpose of developing or operating satellite child development home programs.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 3-16
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-16, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 4-401.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 5-174
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-174, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 4-406.
